title: My LOL Shop
body:
I am from The Caribbean, Country is Trinidad.
I am planning to open a Shopping Place of my own where I can sell clothing etc....
I've noticed LOL has a store.. I wanted to know if The LOL Store sells Wholesales?
**So if I'm buying 10 Blitzcrank Figure (1 = $25.00)  .. Do I have to pay full price or is there some sort of discount? **


Thank you for reading :)

replies.body: Thank you all for your feedback :) greatly appreciate it :)

I dont think this is even legal, it may depends on the law there.
And if there was a supply to retail, it would need to be a lot bigger than 10, and to a legitimate business.
There's no wholesale discount on the store. You're out of luck there.
